SELECT schedule_id, title, content, color, repeat_unit, alert_time, start_time, end_time FROM schedule
AND (TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(start_time, 'MM'), '99') <= #{month} AND TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(end_time, 'MM'), '99') >= #{month})
AND EXTRACT(WEEK FROM start_time) <= #{totalWeekly} AND EXTRACT(WEEK FROM end_time) >= #{totalWeekly}
ORDER BY start_time

SELECT schedule.schedule_id as id, title, content, color, repeat_unit, alert_time, start_time, end_time, file_id, origin_name, path FROM schedule LEFT OUTER JOIN file ON schedule.schedule_id = file.schedule_id WHERE schedule.schedule_id = ${id}
